findings.message: MyToken (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#29-124) has incorrect ERC20 function interface:MyToken.transfer(address,uint256) (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#92-99)
findings.name: erc20-interface

findings.message:
owned.transferOwnership(address) (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#18-20) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#19)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
MyToken.changeAuthorisedContract(address) (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#53-56) should emit an event for: 
	- authorisedContract = target (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#55)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message:
MyToken.changePrice(uint256) (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#78-81) should emit an event for: 
	- amountOfTokensPerEther = newAmountOfTokensPerEther (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#80)
findings.name: events-maths

findings.message:
owned.transferOwnership(address).newOwner (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#18) lacks a zero-check on :
		- owner = newOwner (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#19)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
MyToken.changeAuthorisedContract(address).target (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#53) lacks a zero-check on :
		- authorisedContract = target (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#55)
findings.name: missing-zero-check

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.11 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector
	- DelegateCallReturnValue
	- ECRecoverMalformedInput
	- SkipEmptyStringLiteral.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.11 (0x864def510d754df9c1d43b925dd9887baa5acb07.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version
